item.title: Overview
item.description:
This page is basically a recap of what would be a user-guide on how to use ODW to generate documentation sites for your own OpenFOAM projects. It’s recommended that you follow the example structure too.

What is ODW?

ODW is a Hugo module with a special focus on generating API docs for OpenFOAM libraries in an “unattended” manner.

The Hugo static site generator builds HTML docs from Markdown files. FoamCD parses and generates Markdown documentation for the OpenFOAM libraries (or any other C++ libs) users point to. This allows to host such websites at no cost on multiple platforms (Github Pages being our main target) and the generation of the docs can be just another step in the user’s CI/CD workflow!
